short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flagger floods the Internet with red flag keywords. It shouldn't bother the NSA since they're not supposed to spy on us anyway.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flagger is a browser add-on that automatically puts red flag keywords (like bomb, Taliban and anthrax) into the web addresses you visit. Install Flagger and help us send a message: government surveillance has gone too far.
